long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Free Way to Save with Cash Back, Coupons, Comparison Shopping, Price History, & Price Alerts

Save with Cash Back, Coupons & Comparison Shopping

Price.com is a free browser extension that helps you save time and money. It offers useful features such as Cash Back, coupons, comparison shopping, price history, and price alerts. Price.com uses patented AI technology to match products and find the best prices while you shop. Save at over 100,000 stores!

üõí Get the Best Price with Comparison Shopping
Compare over 1 billion products from thousands of stores within seconds. Price.com helps score you the lowest price when you shop. Save on new, used, and refurbished items.

üí∏ Easy Cash Back
With Price.com, you can easily get cash back on purchases by clicking "activate" on over 5,000 online stores. Plus, you'll receive alerts when Cash Back is available.

üíµ So Many Ways to Get Your Cash
Redeem cash back to debit cards, PayPal, Zelle, Venmo, donations, crypto, and gift cards. Donate to over 2 million charities.

‚úÇÔ∏è Use the Best Coupon Codes
For select merchants, promo codes are applied automatically to your cart. Additionally, Price.com has manual coupon codes available for thousands of stores.

------
By using this Chrome extension, you agree to the Price.com Terms & Conditions available at https://price.com/terms

When you follow our links to visit a store, we get paid a commission on what you buy during your visit. We then share that commission with you, our members, through our Cash Back Rewards program. The commission amount, and in turn, the Cash Back Rewards you earn, are based on commission rates that the participating store offers at the time of purchase.

Retailers pay us to drive sales and help grow their brands. We relay shoppers to their websites or brick-and-mortar stores and may also feature them on our website, in emails, or in other marketing opportunities. You, the Price.com user, benefit by earning Cash Back Rewards based on our traffic to the retailers.
